column2: "Hey we meet again! We meet a lot. Because you fight a lot too."
"Maybe you want to die too? Is Lisa wrong? It doesn't really matter."
"There are some ARKS who fight looking to die. The most famous is Gettemhart."
"For him it's either kill or be killed, he doesn't really think beyond that."
"What people think and wish for is up to them. Lisa has no authority or responsibility to stop him."
"But if he wants to die, then Lisa wants the be the one to blow his brains out! Fufufufu."
